title: Dragonslayer Pantheon and Braum available now

replies.body: Nice job Riot, you scared off Ao Shin! Now he'll never join the League.
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} Ao Shin was a massive teaser one that they should never allow to happen again... That was destructive to my heart...

I actually went to the C2E2 expo and asked RIOT about Ao shin and if they were still developing the awesome dragon or not. **apparently they are still developing it?** and its very difficult to animate something that would more like a dragon

Now all rito needs is an AP Mid Dragonslayer to complete the set

I wonder when Riot will get into the Shurima Desert aspect of League like they did with the Freljord... RITO PLS!
{{champion:32}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:101}}
Ez is Piltover,he just acquired his powers from Shurima. And you are missing Kass he is the good one between him and Maz (~ouo)~

Okay, so {{champion:81}} isn't FROM Shurima, {{champion:33}} left, {{champion:75}} and {{champion:58}} are aliens, {{champion:38}} was left out, and we're forgetting {{champion:26}} ..... But the point is, at some point, they all have had something to do with Shurima. So they are acceptable candidates for a Shurima Desert Theme. Props to JewDidntWork for thinking about this idea.

Edit note: If they come out with this theme, they should preceed it with Kass' daughter coming back through the void for revenge on Malz.
who builds {{item:3025}} on Malz?
Evidently pimps do.

I guess you could say these skins will be

(•_•)

( •_•)>⌐■-■ 

(⌐■_■)

ON FIRE! {{summoner:14}} 

YYYYEEEEAAAAAAHHHHHHHHH!!!

Can you please cover {{champion:67}} up? Why would you fight dragons with your chest and stomach exposed like that? It just looks silly and out of place next to fully armored {{champion:80}}  and {{champion:59}}
You gay bro?

No, but if I was, it wouldn't change my opinion or the reason behind it. Vayne simply looks ridiculous and out of place to me. Riot just built up the Dragons to be terrifying and awesome creatures capable of melting cliff sides with their fiery breath. Why would somebody as intelligent and serious as Vayne go up against them with anything less than a full suit of dragonscale armor? I get that Riot is trying to appeal to adolescent males (hell, they got me with Snowstorm Sivir) but still, this is too much.
Dude. Vayne is all about mobility. Having her bulk up wouldn't fit her playstyle.
True, but of all the places to remove armor, the vital areas seem like a silly place to do so.
@Omniscient Truth: it's skin-coloured armour

Why would she try to fight demons and then wear a full spandex suit which is supposed to make her more agile and then wear a cape which restricts movement? Nobody would want to play a fantasy game if it wasn't a fantasy.
The cape and suit are to instill the fear! Vayne = Batman
Thank you for recognizing the views of the small but existent female gamer population

You're welcome. I wish they were just the views of the entire gamer population. I'm all for super attractive champions in a fantasy game, male and female alike. What I don't like to see is borderline sexism in cases like these, where female attractiveness is based on how much skin is showing at the expense of any kind of realistic armor/clothing. It's one thing in cases like Ahri, where her whole story and character is based on seduction. It's a lot more problematic, I think, when we see it in a champion where it doesn't fit with her character or lore at all, or the skin itself for that matter.

Honestly she is out of place.  I wish they would follow a similar color scheme (a hue of red).  The reason for the open stomach is because of tumbles, tumbles become less effective with something extremely sturdy stopping half your tuck.
Give this man a {{item:2010}}

Obviously fake, Teemo isn't even a dragon. 1:00

GF Riot

How in the world did you catch this? .1 seconds of screen time.

Awesome spot!
Because all good players are ALWAYS watching for Teemo sightings. {{item:2044}} +{{item:2043}}   + {{champion:17}}  awareness wins games.

i would love to see a dragon trainer skin set that is equally matched to the slayer skins or by the books they should be match, player skill would determine the win
1:00. Teemo is a dragon: confirmed.

They teamed up to kill the Dragon that killed Shyvana's father IIRC. Thats who J4 wears in his Dragonslayer skin.

BLUE RED RED RED RED
sucks to be vayne

I don't get why they didn't make a dragon slayer skin that matched each of Shyvana skins? Like vayne is her ice one, J4 is her original,Braum could be the iron scale one, pantheon would be bone claw, and then they could release a new Shyvana skin with the new dragon slayer skin! Well I at least though it would have been cool...
